alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell; Calhoun; Lexington; Orangeburg; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:09PM EDT until April 05 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Aiken County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 608 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Red Bank to near Barnwell State Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Cayce, Barnwell, McEntire Air Base, Brookdale, Williston, Blackville, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, St. Matthews, Gaston, Orangeburg County Airport, Barnwell State Park, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Claflin College, Horrel Hill, South Carolina State University, SC State Farmer`s Market and Sandy Run. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 42 and 44. Interstate 26 between mile markers 116 and 149. Interstate 77 between mile markers 1 and 3. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina. A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Conditions are favorable for tornadoes to form. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Barnwell; Calhoun; Lexington; Orangeburg; Richland
